metadata.title: CVE-2024-0232 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
[use-after-free bug in jsonParseAddNodeArray]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0232` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lemon - 3.40.1-1ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-0 - 3.40.1-1ubuntu0.1
libsqlite3-tcl - 3.40.1-1ubuntu0.1
sqlite3 - 3.40.1-1ubuntu0.1
sqlite3-tools - 3.40.1-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sqlite3 package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.40.1-1ubuntu0.1').
